OOC:Huh... Lurker... AzureBlade has been trying to speak with Weapon, 
but you never replied...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Err, because of lack of tasks for my characters, I'm losing 
interest.  I need stuff to do!  The only interesting thing happening 
is with Orchestra and all that stuff.  Megatron, give my damn 
Decepticons something to do!  Iron Raptor, my Maximals are bored!
> 
> BIC:  ::Orchestra/Composer/My Decepticons/Weapon::
> 
> Orchestra landed at the IGL base.  He sent a message to all IGL 
guards and staff and stuff in the area.
> 
> "This is Orchestra of the Predacons, I am here to pickup 
Blacknightmare.  May I watch her battle or go end it or wait out 
here?" said Orchestra.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Composer went over to Wheeljack.
> 
> "Hey Wheeljack, how's it going?" Composer asked, putting his hand on 
Wheeljack's shoulder.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Bodicons were bored.  They wandered around the interior of the 
Dark Avian.
> 
> "Megatron," Decapitron asked through his comm-link, "Do you have an 
assignment for me and my Bodicons?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Jume and Whee landed by the opposite side 
of the Maximal base, the opposite of the side that Weapon was 
attacking.
> 
> "You greasy, smelly, rotten, nasty Maximals!  We want to make a 
trade with you!  We request to see Iron Raptor immediately!" 
Triggerhappy shouted out, trying to act as leaderly as he could.
> 
> "Guys, have your weapons ready in case they decide to fire!" 
Triggerhappy ordered.
> 
> Skullgrin had his gun aimed at the base, and Jume and Whee had their 
weapons ready as well, not quite understanding what was going on.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Weapon was getting bored with the Maximals.  He walked away, and 
then activated some jet-wings and flew towards the Dark Avian...
> 
> 
> ~The Keeper of Souls~
> ~The Shadow of the Dark~
> ~I Am, The Lurker of the Abyss~
